p.if: If you have the codeword Assassin, immediately.
If not, if you have the title Protector of Sokara, you are sent in to see the provost marshal immediately - .

section.p: Otherwise, you have to wait several hours to be seen by one of the provost marshal’s aides, a certain Captain Royzer.

p.if: If you have the codeword Artery, Royzer sends you in to see Marloes Marlock immediately - .

section.p:
Otherwise, you will have to convince the captain it is worth his while to let you see the provost marshal.
If you are a Warrior, Rogue or Troubadour, Royzer will let you in for the modest bribe of 5 Shards -
turn to 191
.

if.if:
If you are a Wayfarer, Priest or Mage, you will have to convince the captain of your loyalty to Sokara first. .
If you are successful, you can then bribe him -
pay 5 Shards and turn to 191
.

section.p: If you fail your CHARISMA roll or do not wish to pay the bribe, Captain Royzer dismisses you rudely. .
